solution.thereIsANewerVersionOfTheExerci:
**Functional Purpose**: Tooltip and alt text indicating an out-of-date exercise solution.
**UI Location**: Solution card, next to the exercise title.
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution that is based on an older version of the exercise.
**Technical Context**: Appears in a `GenericTooltip` and as `alt` text for a warning icon. No variables.
**Current English**: "There is a newer version of this exercise. Visit the exercise page to upgrade to the latest version."
solution.passesTestsOfTheLatestVersionOf:
**Functional Purpose**: Alt text for an icon indicating a solution passes tests.
**UI Location**: Solution card, next to the exercise title.
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution that passes the tests of the latest exercise version.
**Technical Context**: Appears as `alt` text for a golden-check icon. No variables.
**Current English**: "Passes tests of the latest version of the exercise"
solution.thisSolutionFailsTheTestsOfTheL:
**Functional Purpose**: Tooltip content for a solution that fails tests.
**UI Location**: Solution card, next to the exercise title.
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution that fails tests for the latest exercise version.
**Technical Context**: Appears in a `GenericTooltip`. No variables.
**Current English**: "This solution fails the tests of the latest version of this exercise. Try updating the exercise and checking it locally or in the online editor."
solution.failedTestsOfTheLatestVersionOf:
**Functional Purpose**: Alt text for an icon indicating a solution fails tests.
**UI Location**: Solution card, next to the exercise title.
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution that fails tests for the latest exercise version.
**Technical Context**: Appears as `alt` text for a cross-circle icon. No variables.
**Current English**: "Failed tests of the latest version of the exercise"
solution.completed:
**Functional Purpose**: Status label for a completed solution.
**UI Location**: Solution card, within the 'extra' section.
**When Users See This**: When a solution has been marked as completed.
**Technical Context**: Standard text. No variables.
**Current English**: "Completed"
solution.published:
**Functional Purpose**: Status label for a published solution.
**UI Location**: Solution card, within the 'extra' section.
**When Users See This**: When a solution has been published.
**Technical Context**: Standard text. No variables.
**Current English**: "Published"
solution.iterations:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the number of iterations for a solution.
**UI Location**: Solution card, within the 'stats' section.
**When Users See This**: Always visible on a solution card.
**Technical Context**: Uses `count` for pluralization; `numIterations` passed to `pluralize`. The variable `count` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "{numIterations} {pluralize('iteration', numIterations)}" (OLD text: "{numIterations} {pluralize('iteration', numIterations)}")
solution.lines:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the number of lines of code.
**UI Location**: Solution card, within the 'stats' section.
**When Users See This**: When `numLoc` is available for a solution.
**Technical Context**: The variable `numLoc` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "{numLoc} lines"
solution.views:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the number of views for a solution.
**UI Location**: Solution card, within the 'stats' section.
**When Users See This**: When `numViews` is available for a solution.
**Technical Context**: The variables `numViews` and `viewLabel` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "{numViews} {pluralize('view', numViews)}"
solution.lastSubmitted:
**Functional Purpose**: Timestamp indicating when the solution was last submitted.
**UI Location**: Solution card, below the 'stats' section.
**When Users See This**: When `lastIteratedAt` is available for a solution.
**Technical Context**: The variable `lastIteratedAt` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Last submitted {fromNow(lastIteratedAt)}"
